title: Would be nice to see upcoming matches on this board

replies.body: I like this idea! I would also like to have this.
Could you check my post or pass it on to someone who knows how to help me please :) http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/iArtMTBf-the-game-crashes-at-the-start
Maybe somehow let this board tie in with Fantasy LCS as well.
